title: Now Get Faster and Easier Visa on Arrival with Visa-Vietnam.org
text: Now Get Faster and Easier Visa on Arrival with Visa-Vietnam.org Now Get Faster and Easier Visa on Arrival with Visa-Vietnam.org Vietnam, 15 September 2015 -- Visa-Vietnam.org offers very simple procedures by which a foreign national can obtain Tourist and Business Visa to Vietnam through Visa on Arrival (VOA). It is a faster, cheap and easy process.Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam ( scoopasia.com ) September 15, 2015 - Visa-Vietnam.org has been offering visa services to its customers for the past 10 years. Visa application process through embassies requires personal visits which can be time and money consuming. A solution for this is the 'Visa On Arrival' option. It can be obtained in three easy steps which includes filling visa application form & making online payment, printing a copy of the visa approval letter and show for boarding and get Visa On Arrival, getting the visa stamped upon arrival at Vietnam. "In order to apply for Visa on Arrival, you will have to get in touch with a reliable travel agent based in Vietnam. The credibility of the travel agent is extremely important as you will be paying a large amount for the Visa and you do not want to be tricked or waste your time in legal hassles. A good travel agent will help you with the Visa Vietnam application process. You will be required to fill up an online application form on the agent's website and pay the Visa fees and service charges to the agent through online bank transfer," stated the spokesperson. He continued, "In order to get Vietnam visa on arrival or landing visa, applicants need to pay two required fees: Service fee and Stamping fee". Moreover, corporate members can avail 26% discount on service fees whereas, frequently members can avail 18% to 22% discount. They guarantee 100% satisfaction to the customers or would refund the money. Customer's information is secure with Visa Vietnam and they use highly-secured payment gate process. RUSH service is also available by which visa approval will be done in 2-3 days. About Visa-Vietnam.org Visa-Vietnam.org is one of the most reputed travel agents in Vietnam who can help easily to secure a Visa on Arrival in Vietnam. They offer special discounts, hassle free application process, processing within 24 hours, affordable prices and easy accessibility. To know more, visit visa-vietnam.org Contact Name: Ta Hoai Nam Address: Room A2, 64 Nguyen Dinh Chieu street, Dakao ward Ho Chi Minh Phone Number: +(00) 84966 56 99 56 # # # Room A2, 64 Nguyen Dinh Chieu street, Dakao ward, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam, 70000 Submitted by visavietor , Visa-Vietnam.Org on Tuesday, 15 September 2015 at 2:43 PM
